title: What is CS0664?
labels: All compiler errors have to be fixed

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • When trying to enter play mode, I am receiving the error below:
error CS0664: Literal of type double cannot be implicitly converted to type `float'. Add suffix `f' to create a literal of this type

sections.title: Cause
content: The CS0664 error is caused when a number with a decimal place is entered when declaring a float but does not include the`f' suffix. Please see the example below.

sections.title: Resolution
content: The error CS0664 is resolved by adding the `f' suffix to the end of the value that you are assigning to the float. See the example below.
